title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 52.17 - Optometry
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 52.17 - Optometry

State Regulations

Admission requirements to a college of optometry shall
include the following preprofessional education: 60 semester hours of college
study, including courses in general chemistry, organic chemistry, biology or
zoology, and physics. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8

52.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
